summary: This bill, the "Charitable Act," amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify and extend the deduction for charitable contributions for individuals who do not itemize deductions. Specifically, it allows a deduction for such individuals in 2026 and 2027, limited to one-third of the standard deduction. Additionally, the bill eliminates a specific penalty related to tax compliance. The effective date for the amendments is for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
